ygData.subject: RE: Brad On Binding (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Am I interpreting his last statement correctly? The way I read it, casters being able to bind in a dungeon zone is a bug.  That would seem to indicate that
ygData.messageBody:
Am I interpreting his last statement correctly? The way I read it, casters
being able to bind in a dungeon zone is a bug. That would seem to indicate
that Verant's original intent was that casters could only bind in cities and
outdoor zones. I've never heard that discussed anywhere before so that lead
to my confusion on his statement.

This may not even be that big of a deal anyway. Most casters I know bind
themselves in the zone right outside the dungeon entrance, i.e. bind in
Lavastorm if they are adventuring in Sol B.

Galtin of E'ci

> We are also considering making it such that casters cannot bind in
> Expansion dungeons (the fact that they can now is actually a bug that is
> too late to fix for the rest of the world).
>
> -Brad
>
>
>
> [Attachments have been removed from this message]
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
